mapper.sql: select id, parent_id, name, url, code, type, sort, create_time, update_time, is_deleted from acl_permission
mapper.select: select distinct c.* from acl_admin_role a inner join acl_role_permission b on b.role_id = a.role_id inner join acl_permission c on c.id = b.permission_id where a.admin_id = #{adminId} and c.type = 1 and a.is_deleted = 0 and b.is_deleted = 0 and c.is_deleted = 0 order by c.sort
